climbs.name: Bloody Fingers
climbs.fa: Chris Kreutzer and Dan Kang, Jun 14th 2018

content.description: A short route that gets progressively harder towards the top. The crux is well protected and is between the 3rd and 5th bolts. It is possible to pull through most of the crux by pulling on the quickdraws if needed. As of summer 2018 there is some dust and loose pebbles on this route, particularly at the bottom, as it has not had much trafic yet, but it was cleaned fairly well when bolted. The anchor bolts have rappel rings to rappel from to get down.
content.protection: 5 bolts with rappel rings on the anchor bolts
content.location: To the right of Agree to Disagree by ~30ft. It gets sun late morning through early afternoon.

content.description: Just finished Agree to Disagree. I think it's 5.9 but I'd like to get someone else's opinion. Give it a shot this weekend and tell me what you think. It's still a little dirty and has potential for rock fall so be careful.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a two bolt belay ledge.
content.location:
It's left of Surf Tower by about 50', on the Tilting Vortex Wall.

A 60m rope is plenty to lower off the bolts.
